# January 24th

#### 'read.csv' for reading datasets

    Name, Age, Height
    Alice, 21, 5.5
    Bob, 25, 6.2
    Charlie, 35, 5.9

```{r}
renv::restore()
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

# csv is file where data is separated by commas

data_hard_code <- data.frame(
  Name = c("Alice", "Bob", "charlie"),
  Age = c(21,25,35),
  Height = c(5.5,6.2,5.9)
)

data_hard_code %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
